article_title: Obama Visits Hospital for Sore Throat
article_text:
WASHINGTON—U.S. President Barack Obama made an unscheduled trip to a Maryland military hospital on Saturday because of a sore throat, the White House said.

Mr. Obama was examined at the Walter Reed National Military Medical Center, according to White House spokesman Josh Earnest.

Dr. Ronny Jackson, the president’s physician, had...

twitter.description: U.S. President Barack Obama made an unscheduled trip to a Maryland military hospital on Saturday because of a sore throat and was found to have soft-tissue inflammation related to acid reflux.
twitter.creator: @ByronTau
